Hashrate:

Your wallet's primary address is a unique address beginning with the number 4.

If you don't have a wallet, you can download one from https://www.getmonero.org/downloads/ on desktop or from https://monero.com/wallets on mobile.

The blockchain is currently about 50 GB and grows a little bigger every day.

The blockchain contains all of monero's important data. Ministo shrinks it where possible by "pruning" automatically.
